Subject: Entire office network down
Brief description of the issue: All network access is down across the entire office.
Detailed Description: Employees are unable to access the internet, file servers, or any internal systems. The issue started around 10:30 AM today.

Subject: CRM software not loading
Brief description of the issue: The CRM software is not launching for any users.
Detailed Description: When attempting to open the CRM software, users receive an error message saying 'Application Failed to Load'. This issue is blocking all sales and customer service activities.

Subject: Printer not responding
Brief description of the issue: The printer in the HR department is not responding.
Detailed Description: The printer was working fine yesterday, but now it shows an error message every time a print job is sent. The printer is still powered on, but no prints are coming out.

Subject: Requesting admin access to server
Brief description of the issue: I need admin access to manage system configurations.
Detailed Description: As a senior developer, I need admin access to the internal server to make configuration changes related to our project. Currently, I only have limited user access.

Subject: Wi-Fi not working in conference room
Brief description of the issue: The Wi-Fi connection in the conference room is not working.
Detailed Description: The Wi-Fi works fine in other areas of the office, but in the conference room, no devices can connect to the network.

Subject: Excel crashing when opening large files
Brief description of the issue: Excel crashes whenever opening files larger than 50MB.
Detailed Description: Whenever we try to open large Excel files, the application crashes. This has been an issue for the past week, and it’s affecting multiple users in the finance team.

Subject: Missing desk chair
Brief description of the issue: My desk chair has been missing for a few days.
Detailed Description: I’ve noticed that my desk chair is missing from my workstation, and I’ve reported it to the office admin team, but it hasn’t been replaced yet.

Subject: Slow internet speed in accounting department
Brief description of the issue: Internet speed has been very slow for the past few days in the accounting department.
Detailed Description: The internet speed has dropped significantly, and it’s impacting the ability to access cloud-based tools. This issue has been ongoing for about 3 days.

Subject: Unable to access project repository
Brief description of the issue: I do not have access to the project repository.
Detailed Description: I need access to the project repository to complete my tasks, but I keep getting a permission denied error when I try to access it. This is blocking my work.

Subject: Keyboard malfunctioning
Brief description of the issue: The keyboard is not responding to certain keys.
Detailed Description: Some keys on my keyboard, including the space bar and 'Enter' key, are not responding. It is making it difficult to work efficiently.

Subject: Email server down
Brief description of the issue: The email server is down and employees cannot send or receive emails.
Detailed Description: We are unable to access the email system, both for internal and external communication. The issue began around 8 AM today and is affecting all employees.

Subject: Access request for project files
Brief description of the issue: I am unable to access certain project files due to permission restrictions.
Detailed Description: As a project manager, I require access to specific shared project files, but my current access level does not allow me to view or edit them.

Subject: Network latency affecting work
Brief description of the issue: High latency on the network is slowing down all work processes.
Detailed Description: The network latency has been unusually high for the last two hours, making it difficult to work on cloud-based tools or access shared drives.

Subject: Mouse not functioning properly
Brief description of the issue: My mouse is intermittently not responding.
Detailed Description: The mouse stops responding randomly, and it requires unplugging and plugging back in to start working again. This is causing minor interruptions in my workflow.

Subject: Accounting software not syncing data
Brief description of the issue: The accounting software is not syncing financial data to the cloud.
Detailed Description: Whenever an update is made in the software, it does not sync with the cloud database, causing data discrepancies between local and cloud systems.

Subject: Intermittent Wi-Fi disconnects in office
Brief description of the issue: Wi-Fi intermittently disconnects in certain areas of the office.
Detailed Description: Employees are reporting intermittent Wi-Fi disconnections in the lobby and meeting rooms, disrupting work during important calls and meetings.

Subject: Desk lamp not working
Brief description of the issue: The desk lamp on my workstation is not turning on.
Detailed Description: I’ve checked the power supply, but the lamp is still not working. I would appreciate it if it could be replaced.

Subject: Laptop screen cracked
Brief description of the issue: The screen of my laptop is cracked and not usable.
Detailed Description: My laptop screen was cracked during an accidental fall, and now it's difficult to work. I need a replacement screen or a new laptop.

Subject: Request for admin access to content management system
Brief description of the issue: I need admin access to the content management system to upload new blog posts.
Detailed Description: I currently have user access but need admin rights to upload and manage new content for the company blog. My current permissions are limited.

Subject: Slow internet speed during video calls
Brief description of the issue: The internet speed during video calls is slower than usual.
Detailed Description: The video calls are lagging and breaking up intermittently. This issue seems to only affect video calls, not regular internet browsing.

Subject: VPN is not working
Brief description of the issue: The VPN is not allowing employees to connect remotely.
Detailed Description: When trying to connect to the company VPN, users are getting an authentication error. This issue has blocked all remote access.

Subject: Monitor flickering
Brief description of the issue: The monitor flickers and is difficult to use.
Detailed Description: The monitor attached to my workstation flickers continuously and distorts the display, making it unusable for work.

Subject: Slack app not syncing messages
Brief description of the issue: Messages in Slack are not syncing across devices.
Detailed Description: When accessing Slack from my mobile device, messages are not appearing instantly. There's a delay of over 15 minutes between devices.

Subject: No access to HR document repository
Brief description of the issue: Unable to access HR documents due to permission restrictions.
Detailed Description: I need access to the HR document repository to view employee files, but my permissions do not allow me to open or download documents.

Subject: Word document is corrupt
Brief description of the issue: I cannot open a Word document due to corruption.
Detailed Description: Every time I try to open a specific Word document, it crashes the application. I am unable to recover the document and need assistance to retrieve it.

Subject: Headset audio issues
Brief description of the issue: My headset has inconsistent audio output.
Detailed Description: The audio quality on my headset is very poor. There is static and the sound cuts in and out during calls.

Subject: Cannot update project permissions
Brief description of the issue: I need to update project permissions for my team, but the system is not letting me.
Detailed Description: I am trying to update the permissions of my team members in the project management tool, but the 'Save' button is not working. This issue has delayed some of our project progress.

Subject: Outlook email notifications delayed
Brief description of the issue: Outlook notifications are delayed by 5-10 minutes.
Detailed Description: I am receiving email notifications in Outlook with a significant delay. It's causing issues in responding to time-sensitive emails.

Subject: Laptop charging port broken
Brief description of the issue: The laptop charging port is not working.
Detailed Description: The charging port on my laptop is no longer functioning, so I cannot charge my laptop. This is a major inconvenience as I need the laptop for work.

Subject: Wi-Fi dropping intermittently
Brief description of the issue: Wi-Fi connection keeps dropping in certain areas of the office.
Detailed Description: The Wi-Fi signal drops out frequently in our conference rooms, making it hard to conduct meetings without interruptions.

Subject: Server down due to hardware failure
Brief description of the issue: The main server has crashed due to a hardware failure and needs immediate attention.
Detailed Description: The main server has gone offline due to a critical hardware issue, and it’s affecting all connected services.

Subject: CRM system not syncing data
Brief description of the issue: The CRM system is not syncing customer data across devices.
Detailed Description: I’m unable to access the updated customer information across devices. The CRM isn’t syncing properly after the last update.

Subject: Slow internet speed during meetings
Brief description of the issue: The internet speed during meetings is extremely slow, causing audio and video lag.
Detailed Description: The internet speed slows down dramatically during virtual meetings, making it difficult to participate effectively.

Subject: Software update notification bug
Brief description of the issue: The software update notification keeps popping up, even after the update has been completed.
Detailed Description: Every time I launch the software, a notification pops up saying there's a new update available, despite having already updated it.

Subject: Permission to access restricted files
Brief description of the issue: I need permission to access restricted files on the shared drive.
Detailed Description: I’ve been assigned to a project that requires me to access certain files on the shared drive, but I do not have the necessary permissions.

Subject: Laptop keyboard malfunction
Brief description of the issue: The keyboard on my laptop is malfunctioning.
Detailed Description: Certain keys on the laptop keyboard are not responding, which is hindering my ability to work efficiently.

Subject: Issues with calendar syncing
Brief description of the issue: My calendar events are not syncing across devices.
Detailed Description: My calendar events are not showing up on my mobile device, even though they are visible on my desktop application.

Subject: Intermittent Wi-Fi signal
Brief description of the issue: The Wi-Fi signal drops intermittently, making it hard to stay connected.
Detailed Description: Wi-Fi connectivity is inconsistent, especially in the kitchen and lounge areas. This is causing minor disruptions.

Subject: Broken office chair
Brief description of the issue: The office chair is broken and uncomfortable to sit in.
Detailed Description: The chair’s backrest is unstable and the wheels do not roll smoothly, making it uncomfortable to use.

Subject: Access to the new project folder
Brief description of the issue: I need access to the new project folder on our shared drive.
Detailed Description: I’ve been assigned to the new project but do not have the permissions to access the shared project folder where the initial files are stored.

Subject: Complete network outage in the office
Brief description of the issue: The entire office network is down and no one can access the internet or internal systems.
Detailed Description: There is a complete network outage, affecting all users in the office. No one can access shared files or use internet resources. Immediate resolution required.

Subject: Issue with data synchronization in the CRM
Brief description of the issue: Customer data is not syncing properly between the CRM and the email marketing tool.
Detailed Description: The data from our CRM system is not syncing correctly with the email marketing tool. This is causing issues with customer follow-up.

Subject: Broken mouse
Brief description of the issue: The mouse is not responding properly.
Detailed Description: My mouse is intermittently unresponsive, causing delays when working on the computer. I need a replacement.

Subject: Permission to access shared project folder
Brief description of the issue: Unable to access shared folder for the new project.
Detailed Description: I need access to the shared folder for our current project, but I am unable to open it due to permission issues.

Subject: Microsoft Teams not launching
Brief description of the issue: Teams application won't open after the recent update.
Detailed Description: I tried restarting Teams after the latest update, but it still won't launch. This is blocking my ability to collaborate with the team.

Subject: Unclear menu options in new software update
Brief description of the issue: Some menu options in the latest software update are unclear.
Detailed Description: The recent update to the project management software introduced new features, but some menu options are unclear and difficult to navigate.

Subject: Wi-Fi signal very weak in certain areas
Brief description of the issue: Wi-Fi connectivity is weak in some parts of the office.
Detailed Description: In certain sections of the office, the Wi-Fi signal is weak, leading to slow internet speeds and constant disconnections.

Subject: Unable to save progress in Google Docs
Brief description of the issue: Changes in Google Docs aren’t being saved properly.
Detailed Description: After making edits in Google Docs, the document doesn’t save the changes. This is preventing me from completing my work.

Subject: Request to reset password
Brief description of the issue: I need to reset my password for accessing the internal portal.
Detailed Description: I’ve forgotten my password for the company portal and need it to be reset so I can access it again.

Subject: Slow connection to external servers
Brief description of the issue: The connection to external servers is very slow.
Detailed Description: When connecting to external servers, the speed is abysmally slow, which is delaying the data transfer and project timelines.
